resources.string: "Qalisa okokufundisa kwe-\"Hlola ngokuthinta\""
"Okokufundisa kokufinyelela"
"Okulandelayo"
"Okwangaphambilini"
"Qeda"
"Phuma"
"Ukuthinta kukhutshaziwe uma okokufundisa kukhuluma"
"Isifundo 1: Ukuhlola isikrini"

"Uma Ukuhlola Ngokuthinta kuvuliwe, ungathinta isikrini ukuze ufunde ukuthi yini okungaphansi komunwe wakho. Isibonelo, isikrini samanje sinezithonjana zohlelo lokusebenza. Thola esisodwa ngokuthinta isikrini bese uhambise umunwe wakho."
"Kuhle. Qhubeka ngokuslayida umunwe wakho esikrinini kuze kube yilapho usuthole okungenani isithonjana esisodwa ngaphezulu."
"Futhi ungahlola ngokuswayiphela umunwe wakho ngakwesokunxele nangakwesokudla noma ikuphi kusikrini. Zama ukuswayipha ngokushesha kusuka kwesokunxele kuya kwesokudla ukuze uhambise isithonjana."
"Ukuze wenze into ethile oyihlolile isebenze, thepha isikrini kabili. Hlola uze uthole isithonjana se-%1$s. Bese uthepha kabili noma kukuphi kusikrini ukuze usenze sisebenze."
"Uthole isithonjana se-%1$s. Thepha kabili noma yikuphi kusikrini ukuze wenze kusebenze isithonjana."
"Uhlole wandlula isithonjana se-%1$s. Zama ukuhlola isikrini uze uthole isithonjana se-%1$s futhi."
"Ukuze uhambe uye kusifundo esilandelayo, thola inkinobho ye-%1$s, etholakala eduze kwekhona eliphansi ngakwesokudla kwesikrini, bese uthepha kabili ukuze usenze sisebenze."
"Isifundo 2: Ukuskrola ohlwini"

"Ukuze uskrole ohlwini, ungaslayida iminwe emibili esikrinini. Isibonelo, isikrini samanje siqukethe uhlu lwamagama ezinhlelo zokusebenza olungaskrola phezulu noma phansi. Okokuqala, zama ukuhlola isikrini uphinde ukhombe uhlelo lokusebenza."

"Manje beka iminwe emibili entweni esohlwini bese uslayida yomibili iminwe phezulu. Uma ufika ngenhla kwesikrini, phakamisa iminwe yakho, uyibeke ezansi kohlu, uphinde uqhubeke nokuslayida uye phezulu."
"Hlola isikrini ukuze uthole uhlelo lokusebenza olulodwa ngaphezulu."

"Futhi ungahambisa ekhasini lonke ngokuswayipha umunwe wakho. Ukuze uhambise ekhasini elilandelayo, swayipha ngakwesokudla usebenzisa ukuhamba okukodwa. Zama ukuhambisa ekhasini elilandelayo ngokuswayipha ngakwesokudla bese ngakwesokunxele."
"Hlola isikrini futhi ukuze uthole uhlelo lokusebenza ekhasini lamanje."

"Ukuswayipha engxenyeni ebhekene, kwesokunxele bese kwesokudla ngokunyakaza okukodwa, kuzoya ekhasini langaphambillini. Zama ukuhambisa ekhasini langaphambilini ngokuswayipha ngakwesokunxele bese ngakwesokudla."
"Ukuze uhambe uye kusifundo esilandelayo, thola inkinobho ye-%1$s, etholakala eduze kwekhona eliphansi ngakwesokudla kwesikrini, bese uthepha kabili ukuze usenze sisebenze."
"Isifundo 3: Amamenyu wokuqukethwe"

"I-ScreenSpeak inamamenyu amabili wokuqukethwe enza kube lula ukuthola izilungiselelo nokulawula, imenyu yokuqukethwe yomhlaba wonke nemenyu yokuqukethwe yendawo. Ungenza into yemenyu isebenze ngokuslayida umunwe wakho kwisiyingi sezinto zemenyu bese uyawudedela lapho uzwa into efiselekayo. Zama ukuveza imenyu yokuqukethwe yomhlaba wonke ngokuswayipha umunwe wakho ku-%1$s ngokunyakaza okukodwa."

"Imenyu yokuqukethwe yomhlaba wonke iqukethe imiyalo evamile esebenza noma yikuphi kuyo yonke i-ScreenSpeak. Zama ukufunda wonke umbhalo okuskrini. Ngokucindezela phakathi nendawo kuskrini ukuveza imenyu eyisiyingi emunweni wakho, bese uslayida umunwe wakho phakathi kombuthano wezinketho kuze kube yilapho uzwa i-\"%1$s.\""
"Uvale imenyu yokuqukethwe yomhlaba wonke. Zama ukuveza futhi imenyu yokuqukethwe yomhlaba wonke ngokuswayipha umunwe wakho ku-%1$s ngokunyakaza okukodwa."

"Kuhle. Lowo myalo uzofunda zonke izinto ezikuskrini. Ngaphezu kwemenyu yokuqukethwe yomhlaba wonke, i-ScreenSpeak iphinde futhi ibe nemenyu yokuqukethwe yendawo. Imenyu yokuqukethwe yendawo ilawula ushintsho ngokusekelwe ekutheni iyiphi into ekuskrini oyikhethile. Zama ukuveza imenyu yokuqukethwe yendawo ngokuswayipha umunwe wakho ku-%1$s ngokunyakaza okukodwa."
"Ukucindezela phansi umunwe wakho phakathi nendawo kuskrini bese uyawuphakamisa futhi kuzokhansela bese kuvale imenyu. Zama ukuvala manje imenyu yokuqukethwe kwendawo."

"Manje uyakwazi ukubonisa nokuzulazula kumamenyu wokuqukethwe. Uzofunda okuningi mayelana nokuthi uwasebenzisa nini amamenyu okuqukethwe kwisifundo esilandelayo. Thola uphinde wenze kusebenze inkinobho ye-%1$s eseduze nekhona elingezansi kwesokudla kweskrini ukuze uqhubeke."
"IsifundoÂ 4: Ukufunda imbudumbudu"

"I-ScreenSpeak inezilawuli eziyimbudumbudu ezikunikeza izindlela ezahlukene zokuzula kumbhalo. Ngokwesibonelo, ungakwazi ukufunda umbhalo ngesigaba ngasinye, ngombhalo ngamunye, noma ngohlamvu ngalunye. Ukuqalisa, thola ibhokisi lombhalo phakathi nendawo kuskrini ukuze ufunde okuqukethwe kwawo."

"Ukugxilisa into kuzofunda wonke umbhalo wayo kuzinga lokuzenzakalela lembudumbudu. Zama ukushintsha imbudumbudu ukuze ufunde lo mbhalo ngohlamvu olulodwa ngaleso sikhathi. Lokhu kungasiza uma ngabe ufuna ukupeleta igama noma ufunde ikheli le-imeyili, njengesibonelo. Okokuqala, swayipha umunywe wakho ku-%1$s ukuze uveze Imenyu Yokuqukethwe Kwasendaweni."
"Uzulazule kude nebhokisi lombhalo oyisisulu. Zama ukuthepha phakathi nendawo kweskrini ukuzulazula ngokubuyela emuva ebhokisini lombhalo."
"Kuhle. Manje slayida umunwe wakho ngokuzungeza imenyu kuze kube yilapho uzwa okuthi %1$s, bese uyakukhetha."
"Uvale imenyu yokuqukethwe kwendawo ngaphandle kokuguqukela ku-%1$s. Swayipha umunwe wakho ku-%2$s ukuze ubonise futhi Imenyu Yokuqukethwe Kwasendaweni."

"Kuhle. Manje uzulazula ngembudumbudu yohlamvu. Ukuswayipha kusuka phezulu kweskrini kuya ngaphansi kweskrini kuzoyisa phambili ngohlamvu olulodwa. Zama ukuswayipha kusuka phezulu kweskrini kuya ngaphansi kweskrini izikhathi ezingu-3 ukuze ufunde izinhlamvu ezingu-3 ezilandelayo zombhalo."
"Ushintshe imbudumbudu ukuze ingasabi ngu-%1$s.Â Ungashintsha ubuyele kokungu-%1$s kusuka kwimenyu yokuqukethwe kwendawo ngokuswayipha umunwe wakho ku-%2$s ngokunyakaza okukodwa."
"Manje usuyakwazi ukushintsha imbudumbudu yokufunda uphinde ufunde umbhalo. Ukuze uqhubeke, yenza kusebenze inkinobho ethi %1$s, etholakala eduze nekhona elingezansi kwesokudla kwesikrini."

"Manje usuyakwazi ukushintsha imbudumbudu yokufunda uphinde ufunde umbhalo. Lokhu kuphetha okokufundisa nge-ScreenSpeak. Ukuze uphume kokokufundisa, thola bese wenza kusebenze inkinobho ethi %1$s, etholakala eduze nekhona elingezansi kwesokudla kweskrini."
"Lokhu omunye umbhalo oyisibonelo ongawufunda ngembudumbudu ehlukahlukene."
"Isifundo esingu-5: Ukuhlela umbhalo"
"Lesi sifundo sizokusiza ukuthi usebenzise i-ScreenSpeak ukuze uhlele ucezu lombhalo. Ukuze uqalise, thola ibhokisi lombhalo phakathi kwesikrini."
"Uma usukhethile inkambu yombhalo ongakwazi ukuyihlela, ungathepha kabili noma kuphi kuskrini ukuze uveze ikhibhodi bese uqala ukuhlela umbhalo. Zama ukuthepha kabili isikrini manje."

"Sekuvele kunomunye umbhalo kunkambu. Ungahambisa isikhombisi ekuqaleni kombhalo kusukela kundawo yemenyu yokuqukethwe. Swayipha i-%1$s ekunyakazeni okukodwa, yenza kusebenze i-%2$s, bese wenza kusebenza i-%3$s."

"Uma uhlela umbhalo, kuyasiza kakhulu ukukhetha imbudumbudu efanelekile ukusuka kundayo yemenyu yokuqukethwe. Swayipha i-%1$s ekunyakazeni okukodwa, yenza kusebenze i-%2$s, bese wenza kusebenze i-%3$s."

"Kuhle. Manje, swayipha umunwe wakho kusukela phezulu ukuya phanzi ukuze uzulazule phakathi kombhalo ngegama ngalinye ngesikhathi. Qhubeka ngokuswayipha kusukela phezulu ukuya phansi uze ufike ekugcineni kombhalo."

"Uma ehlela umbhalo, ungasebenzisa okhiye bevolumu kudivayisi yakho ngokuzulazula kumbhalo ngokuswayipha umunwe wakho. I-ScreenSpeak nayo ikunika ukulawula kokukhetha umbhalo. Ungakhetha yonke imibhalo kubhokisi ngokusebenzisa indawo yemenyu yokuqukethwe. Swayipha i-%1$s ekunyakazeni okukodwa, sebenzisa i-%2$s, bese wenze kusebenze i-%3$s."

"Kuhle. ukhethe yonke imibhalo. Uma ufuna ukulawula okuhle ngaphezulu kokukhethile, ungenza kusebenze imodi yokukhetha kusukela kumenyu yokuqukethwe kwasendaweni. Uma uhlela umbhalo, ungathayipha ngokusebenzisa ikhibhodi ekuskrini ngokuslayida umunwe wakho eduze kwekhibhodi futhi nokuphakamisa uma uzwa ukhiye othandwayo. Zama ukuthayipha omunye umbhalo ukuze ufake esikhundleni umbhalo owukhethile."

"Uma usucedile ukuhlela umbhalo, ungavala ikhibhodi. Slayida umunwe wakho uze uthole inkinombo Kweziwe, bese phakamisa umunwe wakho ukuze uyisebenzise. Lokhu kuphetha okokufundisa kwe-ScreenSpeak. Ukuze uphume kokokufundisa, thola ukusebenza kwenkinobho ye-%1$s, etholakala eduze nekhona elingezansi kwesokudla kwesikrini."
"Isampuli yombhalo"
"Phuma"
"Ukuhlola Ngokuthinta kuyadingeka"
"Lokhu okokufundisa kudinga Ukuhlola ngokuthinta. Sicela uvule i-ScreenSpeak bese unike amandlaÂ ukuhlolaÂ ngokuthinta ngaphambi kokuqalisa okokufundisa."
"I-ScreenSpeak imiswe okwesikhashana"
"Isifundo se-ScreenSpeak asitholakali ngenkathi impendulo imiswe okwesikhashana. Sicela uqalise kabusha impendulo ye-ScreenSpeak futhi uqalise phansiÂ okokufundisa ukuze kuqhubeke."
"Awukho umsebenzi ozokwenziwa wokuthinta"
"Akukho ukuthinta okunikezwe kwisenzo se-\"%1$s\". Sicela uvakashele izilungiselelo ze-ScreenSpeak ukusetha ukuthinta kwesinqamuleli saleso senzo, bese uqalisa kabusha okokufundisa kwe-ScreenSpeak."
